mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUTE (COMMUTE_ID, EMP_ID, START_TIME, FINISH_TIME) VALUES (CONCAT(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd'), CONCAT('_', TO_CHAR(#{param1}))), #{param1, jdbcType=NUMBER}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUTE SET FINISH_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE EMP_ID = #{param1} AND TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'yyyyMMdd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd')
mapper.select: SELECT COMMUTE_ID, EMP_ID, START_TIME, FINISH_TIME, TRUNC(MOD((FINISH_TIME - START_TIME), 1)*24, 1) AS "worktimeOfDay" FROM COMMUTE WHERE EMP_ID = #{param1} ORDER BY COMMUTE_ID
